Ko: <color=blue>의지</color>를 <color=red>오버라이드</color>하여 강한 능력을 획득 할 수 있습니다.
En: You can <color=red>override</color> the <color=blue>Will</color> to obtain powerful abilities.

Ko: 태초에 두 뱀이 있었습니다.. 하나는 선약과를 집어먹은 드레이코{COMMA} 다른 하나는 그것을 시셈한 나가 입니다..
En: In the beginning{COMMA}there were two serpents.\nOne was Draco{COMMA} who dared to bite into the Fruit of Covenant.\nThe other was Naga{COMMA} who burned with envy.

Ko: 예전에 사람들은 이곳을 탑이라고 불렀습니다. 지금은...고립된 생지옥지지만요..
En: Long ago{COMMA}this place was known as the Tower.\nBut now... it's a desolate cage of torment{COMMA}cut off from all salvation.

Ko: 당신이 본 '의지'는 다른 누군가의 꿈의 잔재일지도 모릅니다.
En: The <color=blue>Will</color> you saw might just be the remnants of someone else's dream.
Magic Crystals are fragments of mana that drop from defeated monsters.

Ko: 전대 마왕이 이 탑을 통치하던 시절엔 이곳은 생각보단 살기 좋은곳이었습니다..
En: Back when the last Dark Lord ruled this tower{COMMA} it was actually a more livable place than you'd expect.
